description: Stabilize route a[href*='experiences.php'] by ensuring it handles events correctly.

operations.content:
events:
  - event_type: click
    handler: handle_click_event
  - event_type: load
    handler: handle_load_event

meta.content:
events:
  - event_type: click
    handler: handle_click_event
  - event_type: load
    handler: handle_load_event
